person_query_description: Allows you to obtain information about people by entering their name and surname.
phone_query_description: Click to query a person by phone number.
plate_query_description: You can see the vehicle by entering the plate, you can reach the profile of the vehicle owner.
enter_plate: Enter the plate of the vehicle.
hack_bank_account_description: Hack into a random bank account and withdraw money.
send_fake_tip_description: Sends a fake tip of the type you choose to your location.
usage_limit: You can use this command once every 30 minutes.
start_timeout: Starting timeout, please try again later.
vehicle_query_description: Queries the vehicles owned by the person.
locate_from_phone_description: You can locate the person's location from the phone number.
click_to_view_persons_vehicles: Click to view the person's vehicles.
click_to_view_vehicle_owner: Click to view the owner of the vehicle.
